app_descript:
Brief:

Teacher Simulator is an engaging game where you step into the shoes of a school teacher. This simulator challenges you to manage a classroom full of diverse students, making sure everyone is learning and maintaining discipline. Sharpen your pencils, answer the tough questions, and keep an eye out for cheaters! As you traverse through the day-to-day life in school, your goal is to rise through the ranks and become the best teacher possible.

  • üèÖ Teacher's Progression: Strive for excellence and work your way up to become the revered best teacher.
